Text:
Don't bother with this. The PDF is terrible quality. Here is quick screen grab of an example page: http://imgur.com/4f56X

The pdf is 3883 pages as a result of the broken formatting, plus it makes it very difficult to read.

Sorry about the bad formatting, however I did still spend money on the book, as well as my time removing DRM restrictions and converting it to a pdf for you guys, so be appreciative that most of the information is still available and readable :)
